title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. 3. Whisk eggs and cheese together in a bowl. 4. Combine hot pasta with pancetta and off-heat mix with egg mixture. 5. Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful dish made with tender chicken and a blend of spices.
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and garlic until soft. 2. Add chicken and curry powder, cooking until chicken is browned. 3. Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve with rice and garnish with coriander.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish packed with colorful vegetables.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
Cooked rice or noodles for serving
instructions: 1. Heat sesame oil in a pan. 2. Add ginger and garlic, sautéing until fragrant. 3. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. 4. Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. 5. Serve over rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious tacos filled with seasoned beef and fresh toppings.
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
instructions: 1. Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned. 2. Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes. 3. Fill taco shells with beef and top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese. 4. Serve with sour cream and salsa.

title: Caprese Salad
summary: A fresh salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: 1. Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate. 2. Tuck in basil leaves between the slices. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. 4. Season with salt and pepper.
